author: Simon Difford
description: A tart minimalist take on a Last Word. Depending on your lemons you may want to balance this cocktail with as much as 5ml / 1 bar spoon of sugar syrup.
name: Spring Feeling
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
